text: Barry Day (born 27 February 1954) is a former Australian rules footballer who played for the Essendon Football Club in the Victorian Football League (VFL). He was recruited from in the West Australian Football League (WAFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Barry Day's profile at Essendonfc.com Category:Living people Category:1954 births Category:Australian rules footballers from Western Australia Category:Essendon Football Club players Category:West Perth Football Club players
title: Barry Day (footballer)
